All Hail B!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2009 Topics (Year of the Laboratory): All Hail B!
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, March 31, 2009 - 09:21 pm:

Just a quick note to commemorate the tenth anniversary of B Campbell founding this community. It seems like just a little while ago that he picked up a copy of Monster Farm 2 and started his own board -splitting off the old MR1 board for topicality reasons.

We've seen a lot of great games since then, and had a lot of fun. All Hail!
